WorkItem.Description: When the datagrid is not in edit mode, it will still eat the "escape" key. It shouldn't do this. Instead it should allow the keystroke to bubble up to containing elements.

Comments.Message: We agree this is a bug. We've filed a bug in our internal database, and it will be fixed in a future release.
I noticed there was a release, but I didn't see this mentioned in the release notes. After testing, it appears this is still a problem in the newest release.
